paragraph.paragraph:
All Vision2 items inherit ../../reference/interface/items/ev_item_chart.xmlEV_ITEM. To view the classes contained in the items cluster, click
/libraries/vision2/reference/interface/items/index.xml here .
paragraph.heading: 2What is an item?
paragraph.paragraph: A Vision2 item is an object that is used to display information within certain primitives. For example, ../../reference/interface/widgets/primitives/ev_list_chart.xmlEV_LIST may hold items of type ../../reference/interface/items/ev_list_item_chart.xmlEV_LIST_ITEM. All Vision2 items are descendants of ../../reference/interface/properties/ev_pixmapable_chart.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE meaning they can display an ../../reference/interface/widgets/primitives/ev_pixmap_chart.xmlEV_PIXMAP.
